item.title: Need ::empty code!
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

  else if(command.startsWith("mycommand") && c.playerRights >= 2) { //my admin command
        try {
          int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10));
          
       } catch(Exception e) {
          c.sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::commmand whatever");
        }

substring 10 = size of command it self minus 1.

item.title: Need ::empty code!
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

if(1 command){

} else if(second command) {

} else { //command not on list....
//goes here... this is a empty :: command
}

here is a example of a command

if(command.startsWith("mute") && c.playerRights >= 1) { try{ String tobekicked = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(tobekicked); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p =(client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; if (c.playerRights > p.playerRights) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); Skills.logging.writeSystemLog(command.substring(5), "mutedusers"); c.sendMessage("You have successfully muted "+command.substring(5)); } else { c.sendMessage("You cannot mute someone higher than you!"); } } else { c.sendMessage("Could not find the user."); } } catch(Exception e){ c.sendMessage("You need to type the name of the person you want to mute."); } }
